name: Pass it through
description:
Pass it through is a very simple and challenging game. Simple to play, super addictive. You have only one mission: pass the buoy to the end. But there are many things that make you think this game is crazy and you can feel how hard it is.

There are many levels with many challenges that you have to pass them all.

☆ FEATURES:
● 60 free levels
● Suitable for all ages
● Lots of challenges for gamer
● Beautiful graphics
● Tablet supported
